lenders.name: evans
lenders.loan_because:
small Funding opportunities to enable my organization, Oguaa Orphan Aid International conduct a Needs Assessment Survey of Orphans and Vulnerable Children in the Cape Coast Metropolis.
    The objective of this Survey is to identify the socio-cultural and economic factors contributions to the situations of Orphans and Vulnerable Children. 
     The findings of the Survey will enable the organization to package a proposal to establish an innovative hospitality Orphange home to cater for the emotional, social, educational and economic needs of identified Orphans and Vulnerable Children so that they will grow up to become responsible adults in the society.
     At the moment the organization is constrained on financial resource and logistics since it relies on its internal resource.
     Oguaa Orphan Aid International is committed to networking with both local and foreign NGOs.Research Institutions and individual students who are conducting post graduate and PHD Research on Children.
lenders.occupational_info:
OGUAA ORPHANAID INTERNATIONAL is a Christian base humanitarian organization. it is non partisan, non governmental and non profit making venture founded in the year 2002 in response to the need of helping alleviate and transform the lives of  the deprived ones, vulnerable and poverty-stricken children, families and societies by tackling educational, developmental and health related issues. Through the placement of volunteer programs.
OUR MISSION
To provide support and resource to meet and sustain social, physical and emotional needs of  deprived and vulnerable children in the society.
AIMS AND OBJECTIVES.

(i)	To advocate for the promotion and protection of the youth, needy and the less privileged.
(ii)	To provide a comprehensive and progressive training for the needy and the less privileged youths to prepare them for the future.
(iii)	To unearth and develop the needy and less privileged youth to reach their full potentials.
(iv)	To help promote, collaborate and co ordinate with government, other non governmental organization and the private sector to improve upon the quality of lives of the people.
(v)	To embark on educational campaigns from time to time to help check chronic and sexually transmitted diseases. (STD).


HOW WE WORK
The organization believes that there are still capable and potential people in the local communities who just need the required support and resources to make it to the top. With our international volunteer placement programmes.the organization works in consultation with the various leaders of the local communities. And private sector organization who show positive social corporate responsibility in reaching the targeted people.

I know how lucky I am being born in a rich European country.  
I enjoy travelling and have seen my share of povety and suffering. As a result I think poverty is a human rights issue and I want to do my part by lending money through Kiva to empower those who wouldnt normally have access to the kinds of opportunities we in the West have.  
I also find the whole lending process fun... apart from the chosing who to loan to that is, I find that kinda stressfull! So many choices!!!

lenders.occupation: Real Estate Sales/Owner of Home Cleaning Business
lenders.loan_because: I work very hard for everything I have. I was a single parent and struggled for years.  Someone lent me a small sum of money for a downpayment on my first home ($1500) and it changed my life.  I hope my small contribution can help change someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes as I am a licensed Realtor in the state of Florida.   I also have a residential cleaning busness. I have 2 employees for the cleaning business.  I also take care of a 93 year old man in my home and employ 2 people to assist in that. I also employ one person who does commercial office cleaning.   My husband is a landscaper and works every day.  He is also enrolled in college to become a nurse.  He is originally from Hungary and works very hard to be a success.  We wish everyone much success.  "You Earn What You Think You Are Worth"

lenders.name: Primebin.com
lenders.loan_because:
As an organization that provides services to small businesses in North America, we see it fitting that we aid and support aspiring entrepreneurs throughout the world.

We loan because we have a genuine love for 'free enterprise' in our hearts. Primebin was established with this principle as our bedrock, and we're proud to support Kiva with all the extraordinary  work they do.
lenders.occupational_info: Primebin provides warehousing and distribution outsourcing in small scale B2B, mail-order and online store environments. Through state-of-the-art warehousing and shipping technology methods, we receive, store, and ship your business inventory at a fraction of the cost of setting up your own brick-n-mortar facility.

I'm an aspiring entrepreneur. I'm no different from any one of these people except for some weird reason I was born on the opposite side of the planet where opportunity is abundant. 

I love that Kiva gives me the opportunity to help those who are less fortunate, but have that same burning entrepreneurial drive.

I hope my loans can help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Noah is a strategic marketing expert specializing in membership retention strategies. Since 2005 he has worked with over 500 online marketers to help them optimize their retention and profits. Noah lives with his wife and their new daughter in Ontario, Canada.

lenders.name: Dr. Ali York
lenders.occupational_info:
Of primary importance to the MOER Foundation, Inc., is ensuring that we, as a global community, can learn to live with, by and for each other. 

The mission of the MOER Foundation, Inc. is to identify and create economic opportunities, education and social support to individuals and families for the enrichment of the global community.
The principal motivation of the MOER Foundation, Inc., is to ensure that our global community's safety and security are a result of respect, cooperation, and an enhanced acceptance that we are one Family.

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to support people less fortunate than us!!!
lenders.occupational_info: The best job in the world.Being a Mum!!!:)

lenders.name: The LEAP Foundation
lenders.loan_because: By making micro-loans to female entreprenuers in developing areas, the LEAP Foundation hopes to join many other charity based organizations that grant micro-loans to deserving borrowers worldwide. By helping them grow and expand their own endeavors, LEAP can empower women to take control of their own futures by enabling them to continually focus on the growth necesasary to sustain long term productivity. We hope to become a key element to helping these women create and sustain wealth for themselves, their families, and their communities by helping them with capital to which they otherwise would have no access.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because:

This is a beautifully simple idea - hats off to Kiva, enabling people to give 'a hand up and not a hand out'.
